name: Freefall Figthing Frenzy for Friends!
description:
Freefall Figthing Frenzy for Friends is a four-person brawler where you are 3 others brawl-it out mid air for the last parachute. 

Time is limited! Get the parachute and make sure to hold onto it tight because the rest will fight you for it.

The game is played with four controllers, Aim with the left analogue stick and launch yourself towards you competitors with the A button.

A game by The Private Constructors.
